title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The general
definitions of Part 200 of this Title apply to this part unless they are
inconsistent with the specific definitions in subdivision (b) of this
section. (b) For the purposes of
this part, the following specific definitions apply: (1)
'Administrator.' Means the same as
'Administrator' in 40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (2)
'Allocate or Allocation.' The
determination by the department, in accordance with this part, of the amount of
CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances to be
initially credited, at no cost to the recipient, to: (i) A CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 unit; (ii)
A new
unit set-aside; (iii)

Energy

Efficiency and Renewable Energy Technology (EERET) Account; or
(iv)

An entity not listed in subparagraphs
(i) through (iii) of this definition; (v) A CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 unit qualifying for an initial credit, provided that, if the
department initially credits zero CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season

Group 2 allowances, the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2
unit will be treated as being allocated an amount (i.e., zero) of CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 allowances. (3)
'Compliance account.' Means
the same as 'compliance account' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section 200. 9 of this
title). (4)
'Control period.'
Means the same as 'control period' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (5)
'CSAPR'. Cross-State Air Pollution

Rule. (6)
'CSAPR NOX Ozone Season

Group 2 allowance.' Means the same as 'CSAPR NOX Ozone Season Group 2
allowance' in 40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (7)
'CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 source.' Means the same as 'CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 source' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (8)
'CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 Trading Program.' Means the same as 'CSAPR
NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 Trading Program' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (9)
'CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 unit.' Means the same as 'CSAPR NO
x

Ozone

Season Group 2 unit' in 40
CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (10)
'Designated representative.' Means the
same as 'designated representative' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (11)
'Emissions.' Means the same as
'emissions' in 40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (12)
'EERET Account.' A general account that
may be opened by the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority
(NYSERDA) from which allowances may be sold or distributed in order to provide
funds to be used to support programs that encourage and foster energy
efficiency measures and renewable energy technologies and cover the reasonable
costs associated with the administration and evaluation of these programs by
NYSERDA. (13)
'General account.'
Means the same as 'general account' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (14)
'Indian country.' Means the same as
'Indian country' in 40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (15)
'Receive or receipt of.' Means the same
as 'receive or receipt of' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (16)
'Source.' Means the same as 'source' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (17)
'Submit or serve.' Means the same as
'submit or serve' in 40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). (18)
'Unit.' Means the same as 'unit' in
40 CFR
97.802
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
243.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 2, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 48, eff. 12/12/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register December 19, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 51, eff. 1/2/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
